column5: Live in the GTA and looking for a job? Yamaha is hiring a Dealer Service Support Coordinator.  Click here for the details.
dang, I thought I was perfect for the job till it said you have to be .Bi...    I don't go that way, so no job for me............
Tres interessant....I wonder HOW bilingual you have to be...?  'Cause "Tres interessant" is about as good as I get
Maybe they want a fork tongue Terry
